titles: Die Sabbathi 19. Decembris, 1646. It is ordered by the Lords in Parliament assembled, that the city printer shall print and publish the two petitions presented to the house this day ... / John Browne cler. Parliamentorum.
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
Browne, John, ca. 1608-1691.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Sutro Library.

With: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: For bringing in of the arrears for the garrisons of the Easterne Association. Die Jovis 10 Decemb. 1646. London : Printed for Iohn Wright ..., 1646 -- Die Jovis, 8. Julii, 1646.
keywords: Humble petition of the lord major, aldermen, and commons of the city of London, in Common-Councell assembled.
Humble representation of the pressing greivances [sic], and important desires of the well-affected freemen, and covenant-engaged citizens, of the city of London.
